title: Israel Credit Outlook Raised by Moody’s as Conflict Risks Recede
description: Israel’s credit outlook was raised to stable from negative by Moody’s Ratings, which cited diminished geopolitical risks following the ceasefire with Hamas last October.
content: Israel’s credit outlook was raised to stable from negative by Moody’s Ratings, which cited diminished geopolitical risks following the ceasefire with Hamas last October.
